sponsor.partnerMessage: Adventure Subaru offers respectful and honest treatment to all customers with upfront pricing, trustworthy service, and a focus on safety. Awarded Subaru of America's Retailer of the Year in 2022 for commitment to customers and the community, we've donated over $3.2m to 70+ charities in NWA. Visit our eco-friendly certified facility or website, and follow us on social media for updates.

posts.title: Don't Miss Kids Day At The Rogers Local Food Market
posts.topic: Sponsored by Rogers Local Food Market
posts.content:
Rogers Local Food Market will host Kids Day this Saturday, May 20, from 9a-12p, including kid-friendly activities like a scavenger hunt, veggie tasting, and more.

  • Healthy habits: Kids Day is hosted in partnership with UAMS and Apple Seeds, and kids will receive vouchers to shop with so they can experience buying fresh, local food for themselves, like the sweet in-season strawberries from McGarrah‚Äôs Farm.
  • Good neighbors: Open on Saturdays from 8a-1p, Rogers Local Food Market welcomes and welcomes and doubles SNAP, Senior Farmers Market Nutrition Program vouchers, and WIC Farmers Market vouchers ‚Äì because healthy local foods should be affordable for everyone!

Follow Rogers Local Food Market on Facebook and Instagram for updates, and find an interactive market map online HERE.

posts.title: Watch 16 Candles With John Cusack At Walton Arts Center
posts.content:
Movie star John Cusack will host an evening of conversation and a screening of the cult classic film 16 Candles at Walton Arts Center on Sunday, Oct 29, at 7p.

  • In your eyes: One of Hollywood's most accomplished and respected actors, Cusack has starred in over 70 films over four decades, gaining critical acclaim and prestigious accolades for his dramatic and comedic roles and will likely forever hold the title for most iconic scene ever filmed with a boombox.
  • Cult classic: 16 Candles was one of Cusack's earliest film appearances and has become a classic portrayal of teen angst and 80's culture. After the film, attendees are invited to join a live conversation with John Cusack about his career and the making of his movies. 

Tickets range from $70-$120 and will go on sale this Friday, May 19, at 10a HERE.

posts.title: Best Friends Pet Resource Center Attempts World Record
posts.content:
In conjunction with National Rescue Dog Day, Best Friends Animal Society will attempt a world record for the Largest Dog Food Donation and invites the public to join the announcement ceremony this Saturday, May 20.

  • Good doge: Aiming to crush the current record of 51,000 lbs, Best Friends has partnered with Baby Doge Community, J.B. Hunt, and several dog food partners ‚Äì Blue Buffalo, Nestle Purina, I and Love and You, and Trisha Yearwood Pet Collection.
  • Share the love: The food will be officially weighed on Friday at a J.B. Hunt facility, then be transferred to the Best Friends Pet Resource Center in Bentonville for the potential record announcement and distribution to local shelters. A large portion will be available to the public for free on Saturday from 1-4p!

Keep up with Best Friends NWA on Facebook and Instagram for updates, and learn more HERE.

posts.title: Arkansas Track Sweeps SEC Outdoor Championship
posts.photoCredit: Arkansas Track & Field and Cross Country
posts.content:
Continuing to dominate the season, Arkansas Track & Field ran away with the men's and women's 2023 SEC Outdoor Championship this past weekend in Baton Rouge.

  • Add it up: The men's team earned its third consecutive and 22nd overall SEC Outdoor title, finishing the meet with 149 total points over second-place LSU with 89 points. The women earned their 10th SEC Outdoor Title with 134 total points, beating out Florida's 112 points.
  • New number: Several records were shattered over the weekend. Arkansas's Jaydon Hibbert set a new Triple Jump collegiate record at 17.87m, and Britton Wilson set the 400m collegiate outdoor record at 49.13 seconds.

Keep up with Arkansas Razorback updates HERE.

posts.title: OZ Brands Promotes Rural Riding With Launch Of OZ Gravel
posts.content:
The outdoor enthusiasts behind OZ Brands have launched a new lifestyle brand called OZ Gravel, dedicated to promoting the rapidly growing gravel cycling scene in Northwest Arkansas.

  • Rock 'n Roll: The OZ Gravel website will provide a place for gravel riders to develop skillsets, connect with other riders, and find new routes through the curated list of beginner, intermediate, and advanced courses handpicked by local cycling aficionado Andy Chasteen.
  • Ride rural: Several mentioned routes are part of the Arkansas Rural Recreational Roads project, an effort to connect rural communities to the economic potential of outdoor recreation in our state.

Connect with OZ Gravel's social communities on Facebook, Instagram, and Strava, and explore the new website HERE.
